record.jsxtip: Fires after the user double-clicks this legend.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the Series that is the target of this event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays series (rather than categories).
the CDF index of the category that is the target of this event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays categories (rather than series).
the CDF jsxid of the category that is the target of the event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays categories (rather than series).

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user selects this legend.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the Series that is the target of this event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays series (rather than categories).
the CDF index of the category that is the target of the event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays categories (rather than series).
the CDF jsxid of the category that is the target of the event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays categories (rather than series).

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user hovers the mouse over this legend and before the spyglass displays. The event script must evaluate to the HTML content to display in the spyglass. Canceling this event prevents the spyglass from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the Series that is the target of the event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays series (rather than categories).
the CDF index of the category that is the target of the event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays categories (rather than series).
the CDF jsxid of the category that is the target of the event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays categories (rather than series).

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user right-clicks this legend and before the bound context menu displays. Canceling this event prevents the menu from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the menu to display.
record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu

record.jsxtext: the Series that is the target of the event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays series (rather than categories)
the CDF index of the category that is the target of the event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays categories (rather than series)
the CDF jsxid of the category that is the target of the event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays categories (rather than series)

record.jsxtip: Fires after this legend is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this legend before it is removed from the DOM.
